text: Area codes 919 and 984 are telephone area code in the state of North Carolina, United States. It covers the central part of North Carolina, including the capital city of Raleigh and its surrounding areas. Area code 919 was one of the original area codes established in 1947. It was overlaid with area code 984 on April 30, 2012. 919 and 984
title: Area codes 919 and 984
